title: $1,400 1 Bed + Study Available 9/1 No Pets
posting_body: One Bedroom + Study, One bath located on first floor of a 4-unit building in quiet and desirable historic district of West Chelmsford, very close to Westford Line.
5 minutes drive to Rt. 3. 5 minutes from Nabnasset Lake Country Club.
Large parking lot behind the house.
Available for 9/1 for $1,400/month.
12 Month Lease.
No utilities included.
Tenant is responsible for gas and electric.
No smoking and no pets.
Must have good credit and references.
Applicants must pass credit and background checks.
First, Last, and Security Required.
Please contact Michael Barry at 978-886-9430 (Cell) Text/Call
Why do I want to live in Chelmsford
» Chelmsford is a quiet rural town with an active family oriented community and many different events
» Primarily suburban, it sits comfortably near some of the more happening towns.
» Transportation is convenient with quick access to I-495, I-93 and Rt. 3, 4, 27, 110 and 129 making it easy to access other towns and locations.
» Much less expensive than living in the city of Boston/helps you save money.
It cost much less to transport into the city than live in it.
Close too many major employers.
» Close too NH border for tax free shopping.
Area Amenities
» Public Transportation nearby
» Short Walk to Local Shopping, Dining and Entertainment
Walking/Biking Trails
Nearby with the Bruce Freeman Rail Trail, Lime Quarry Reservation and Great Brook State Park
Convenient to Routes 3, 4, 27, 110, 129 and I-93, I-495
Well Ranked Public Schools
